roleset.name: to prevail over or declare void
roleset.note: OVERRULE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'overrule' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from overrule.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: typical
example.text: That would be an ironic result of a case in which [the Supreme Court]-2 expressly stopped short of [*-2]overruling Roe vs. Wade.
